testimonial.position: Engineering Manager & Head of Innovation Lab @BiztechCS
testimonial.message: Vedang is hard working and problem solver. He is always eager to learn and improve himself. Enjoyed working with him on the same teamüëç

I have managed many people but Vedang is unique one to work. His work ethics are pristine, and he is easily adjustable to a given situation. His ability to go out of his way to help others has made him stand out. Thanks a lot, man! You made the transition smooth and more comfortable. Really great worküëçüëçüëçüëçüëç

A smart and diligent individual who is always ready to face and solve any unknown challenges. Vedang and I have worked on copious projects together and always enjoyed working with a person, a hard-worker, who tries to step forward and help every other person possible. He has profound knowledge of almost all programming languages with relevant code reduction techniques. As a colleague, I would highly recommend him as an employee.
I had pleasure of working with vedang for 1.5 year and yeah, he is hard working guy and game changer.

He is good in his profession also good as mentor, Outside the company he is great friend. Also one more thing is that he is always encouraging person and yeah funniest person for any kind of situation.
The most joyful working skills can be learned from him. He is out of the box thinker. Highly recommended
I had the pleasure of working with Vedang collaborating on same project. He knows how to enjoy your work rather than only doing and complete it. Highly recommended.

He is a self-learner & passionate individual for mobile development. I always enjoy & learn new things from him while working on the projects. He has good grasping power for working on new technologies. I would definitely go to him for any kind of mobile development solution.
